functionality.translation[0].definitions: one or all of the operations that a computer, software program, or piece of equipment is able to perform
functionality.translation[1].definitions: one or all of the operations that a computer, software program, or piece of equipment is able to perform
The module provides the functionality needed to run a Unix client with a Unix server in a local network environment.
The user manual should explain how to use all the functionalities, such as e-mail, Telnet and FTP.
